Attacks.Name: Water Gun
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away S distance from Staryu.

Attacks.Name: Swift
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight. If a wild is rolled, this attack deals 1 additional damage.

Attacks.Name: Rapid Spin
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Staryu may make an immediate move action. If a wild is rolled, remove one special condition from Staryu.

Superpowers.Name: Misty's Team
Superpowers.Effect: Friendly characters with the Water type add 1 die to their defense rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Natural Cure
Superpowers.Effect: At the start of this character's activation, remove all special conditions from it.

Superpowers.Name: Illuminate
Superpowers.Effect: All allied characters within range and line of sight add 1 die to their next attack roll. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Bubble Beam
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Slow special condition, reducing their movement by S during their next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Recover
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 2 damage from this character. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Starmie character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
